repos.description: A Claude Code plugin that detects changes in OpenAPI/Swagger spec files using Git diff and generates a changelog in Markdown format.

plugins.name: openapi-changelog
plugins.description: Track OpenAPI/Swagger spec changes and generate changelog using Git diff

skills.name: openapi-diff
skills.description: Analyze OpenAPI/Swagger spec or source code changes. Triggers: API diff, spec changes, breaking changes, changelog

frontmatter.name: openapi-diff
frontmatter.description: Analyze OpenAPI/Swagger spec or source code changes. Triggers: API diff, spec changes, breaking changes, changelog

skills.content:
# OpenAPI Diff Skill

## Modes
- **Spec File**: Compare swagger.json/openapi.yaml versions
- **Source Code**: Analyze git diff for API decorators/annotations

## Spec Structure
```yaml
# OpenAPI 3.x: paths â†’ components/schemas
# Swagger 2.x: paths â†’ definitions
```

## Change Detection

| Type | Look For |
|------|----------|
| Endpoints | Routes, HTTP methods, paths, req/res types |
| Schemas | Fields, types, required/optional, validations |
| Parameters | Query, path, header, body params |
| Deprecation | @deprecated, deprecated flags |

## Breaking Changes (Auto-flag)
1. Endpoint removal
2. Required param/field addition
3. Response field removal
4. Type change
5. Enum value removal
6. URL path change

## Algorithm
Spec: Parse JSON/YAML â†’ Compare paths/schemas â†’ Classify â†’ Detect breaking
Source: git diff â†’ Analyze decorators â†’ Classify â†’ Detect breaking

## Language
Korean chars in code/spec â†’ Korean output | Otherwise â†’ English
